mapper.select: select mu.*,m.material_urls from material m join material_user mu on mu.material_id=m.material_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
select * from user u join material_user mu on u.user_id=mu.user_id join material m on mu.material_id=m.material_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

select mu.*,u.user_name,u.user_img_url,m.material_urls from material_user mu join user u on mu.user_id=u.user_id join material m on m.material_id=mu.material_id ${ew.customSqlSegment} order by mu.create_time desc
select pm.*,u.user_name,u.user_img_url from public_material pm join user u on u.user_id=pm.user_id ${ew.customSqlSegment} order by pm.create_time desc
